product_name: Lonely Planet Guides An Innocent Abroad: Life-Changing Stories from 35 Great Writers
long_description: An Innocent Abroad: Life-Changing Stories from 35 Great Writers includes 35 short stories from travel authors including Pico Iyer, Dave Eggers, Cheryl Strayed and David Baldacci.
short_description: An Innocent Abroad: Life-Changing Stories from 35 Great Writers includes 35 short stories from travel authors including Pico Iyer, Dave Eggers, Cheryl Strayed and David Baldacci.
